title: Science-Integrated Language Education Design: Problem-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Language learning environment using smartphone-based VR simulations, enhancing communication skills by linking everyday problems to scientific modeling and linguistic expression

learning_goals: Enhancement of argumentative writing skills to analyze real-life problems through scientific modeling (e.g., fermentation processes)
Design and implementation of collaborative inquiry processes for problem-solving in simulation/VR environments
Improvement of knowledge transfer skills to convert scientific practices into linguistic expressions (reports, presentations)

resources: Collaborative Learning Space for Group Work
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
